decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast-paced aggressive strategy while maintaining board control with disruptive creatures like Thalia, Guardian of Thraben and Archon of Emeria. Collected Company is used to quickly generate additional threats, while Skyclave Apparition offers removal options. The deck aims to curve out efficiently with a mix of low-cost creatures and mana acceleration from Llanowar Elves and Elvish Mystic. Eiganjo, Seat of the Empire and Shefet Dunes provide additional utility for protecting key creatures or pumping up the team for a decisive attack.

This deck focuses on utilizing cards that allow for quick and aggressive plays, while also setting up ways to bring back Arclight Phoenix from the graveyard. By using cards like Lightning Axe and Fiery Impulse to control the board and Consider and Sleight of Hand to draw cards efficiently, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures like Arclight Phoenix. Utilizing spells like Opt and Spell Pierce to protect its creatures, the deck is designed to be fast-paced and put pressure on the opponent early in the game.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on fast and aggressive gameplay, utilizing low-cost creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Callous Sell-Sword to quickly deal damage to opponents. Cards like Fatal Push and Infuriate help to control the board and pump up creatures for additional damage. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion provides additional ramp and consistency to the deck. Den of the Bugbear and Sokenzan, Crucible of Defiance provide additional sources of damage. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a relentless assault of creatures and burn spells.

The deck focuses on controlling the opponent's actions through a combination of removal spells, enchantments, and powerful creatures. The strategy involves using cards like Overlord of the Mistmoors, Overlord of the Hauntwoods, and Overlord of the Floodpits to dominate the battlefield while disrupting the opponent's plans with cards like Leyline Binding and Go for the Throat. The deck also utilizes mana ramp with cards like Up the Beanstalk and Nylea's Presence to ensure it can cast its high-cost spells efficiently. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue and outlast the opponent with its strong control elements.

This deck focuses on quickly casting Arclight Phoenix from the graveyard by casting multiple instants and sorceries in a turn. Utilizing low-cost spells like Fiery Impulse and Picklock Prankster, it aims to put pressure on the opponent early in the game. Drawing cards with Opt and Consider helps to find key pieces while maintaining speed. The inclusion of Artist's Talent and Profit's Eidetic Memory provides additional value and versatility. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a flurry of spells and aggressive creatures, ultimately leading to a swift victory.

The main focus of this deck is to rapidly fill the graveyard with spells in order to bring back Arclight Phoenix multiple times for aggressive plays. The deck includes cards like Consider, Opt, and Sleight of Hand to dig through the deck quickly, while also including removal spells like Lightning Axe and Fiery Impulse to control the board. Artist's Talent and Picklock Prankster help generate value and card advantage. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with consistent threats and efficient spell usage.

This deck focuses on utilizing Enigmatic Incarnation to control the board and bring out powerful creatures. The key strategy is to consistently tutor for specific creatures using Enigmatic Incarnation and Leyline Binding to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The inclusion of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion provides additional value and flexibility. The deck also includes a variety of powerful creatures like Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Elesh Norn, Mother of Machines to dominate the battlefield. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue and outmaneuver the opponent by efficiently controlling the game.

The primary strategy of this deck is to aggressively control the board by utilizing sacrifice effects and synergy between creatures. By sacrificing creatures like Cauldron Familiar and Bloodtithe Harvester to Witch's Oven or Mayhem Devil, you can deal damage to your opponent while generating value. Claim the Firstborn and Deadly Dispute provide additional ways to take advantage of sacrificing creatures, and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker can help you refill your hand. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm your opponent with a combination of efficient removal and recurring threats.

This Mono Black Control deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy through hand disruption with cards like Thoughtseize and Duress, while also utilizing removal spells like Fatal Push and Go for the Throat to control the board. The deck also utilizes creatures like Unstoppable Slasher and Graveyard Trespasser to apply pressure on the opponent. The inclusion of cards like Cling to Dust and Sheoldred's Edict provide additional graveyard hate and removal options. The deck aims to control the game, disrupt the opponent's plans, and ultimately dominate the battlefield.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through a combination of hand disruption, targeted removal, and efficient creature threats. It utilizes a combination of cards like Duress and Thoughtseize to disrupt the opponent's game plan, while also utilizing removal spells like Fatal Push and Go for the Throat to deal with threats on the board. The deck also includes resilient threats like Graveyard Trespasser and Bloodletter of Aclazotz to apply pressure and close out the game. Castle Locthwain provides card advantage, while cards like Unstoppable Slasher and Sheoldred's Edict help to maintain board control.

This deck focuses on utilizing inexpensive aggressive creatures and burn spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent. With a mana curve that allows for fast and efficient plays, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize. The inclusion of Jegantha as a companion provides additional mana flexibility and consistency to ensure a smooth gameplay experience. Overall, the Rakdos Aggro archetype emphasizes speed and aggression to pressure opponents and secure a victory in a Pioneer 1 vs 1 format.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly deploy threats and disrupt the opponent's game plan while maintaining card advantage. By utilizing cheap spells like Fiery Impulse and Lightning Axe to control the board and get rid of threats, as well as cantrips like Opt and Sleight of Hand to dig for key cards, the deck aims to efficiently bring back Arclight Phoenix from the graveyard and close out the game with a flurry of spells. The inclusion of cards like Prof's Eidetic Memory and Picklock Prankster provide additional value and options for the player.

This deck focuses on using Enigmatic Incarnation to tutor for powerful creatures and control the board. Utilizing Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion for added value, the deck includes a variety of creatures with varying abilities to adapt to different situations. The deck also includes a mix of lands to ensure consistency and mana fixing. Overall, the strategy revolves around using Enigmatic Incarnation to gradually build up a board presence and control the game through powerful creature plays and removal spells.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on quickly reducing the opponent's life total by playing aggressive creatures and burn spells. The key strategy is to establish a strong board presence early on with efficient threats like Kumano Faces Kakkazan and Reckless Bushwhacker, supported by burn spells like Play with Fire and Fatal Push to clear the way. By applying pressure from the start and maintaining a fast tempo, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize or mount a defense.

The main concept of this Mono Black Control deck is to disrupt and control the opponent's game plan through a combination of hand disruption (Thoughtseize, Duress), removal spells (Fatal Push, Heartless Act), and creature removal (Blade of the Oni, Sheoldred's Edict). The deck also utilizes powerful creatures like Bloodletter of Aclazotz and Unstoppable Slasher to apply pressure on the opponent. The inclusion of cards like Field of Ruin and Castle Locthwain help with mana fixing and card advantage. The deck aims to outvalue the opponent through efficient removal and powerful threats.

The deck revolves around using Lotus Field and various cards to generate a large amount of mana quickly, allowing for powerful combo plays. Emergent Ultimatum is a key card for tutoring powerful spells, while Hidden Strings and Archdruid's Charm provide utility and card advantage. The deck also includes ways to protect its combo pieces and disrupt the opponent's strategy. Overall, the focus is on assembling the right pieces to go off and win the game in a single explosive turn.
